value.name: Interfaith leaders stand in solidarity for legislation on national police reform
value.description: Akron-area clergy, community leaders add their voices to chorus asking U.S. Senate to approve House-sponsored George Floyd Justice in Policing Act.

value.name: ‘Jeffrey Westerfield’ Facebook Post
value.description: Viral posts purportedly describing the death of law enforcement officer Jeffrey Westerfield on his 47th birthday circulated in May 2021, co-opting language of the Black Lives Matter movement.

value.name: 110 Black Men And Boys Killed By Police
value.description: Ezell Ford, whose family described him as mentally ill, died after he was shot multiple times by Los Angeles Police Department officers in Florence, California, on August 11, 2014. Two police ...

value.name: America uprising: Scholars reflect on the death of George Floyd. Plus, 10 tips for journalists covering protests against police violence.
value.description: Nearly a dozen scholars on policing, economic and health inequality and media narratives reflect on the death of George Floyd in Minneapolis.

value.name: Los Angeles Police Department
value.description: The LAPD has released the names of two officers involved in Ezell Ford’s (pictured) fatal shooting, the Los Angeles Times reports.…
